comment: Good teacher for the CM program here since we don't have many options. Her quizzes are really hard (expects you to know everything like you work in the industry already) but her labs count for just as much so if you do them you'll be fine. Definitely come to class though bc you can't make up anything unless it's for a legit reason.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: She is a decent professor and is knowledgeable but she is disrespectful and very stern. I don't personally like her and wouldn't take her again if I had the choice. She is the only professor for a few classes.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Ms Maureen is awesome probably one of the best teachers we have in the CM department. She came from the industry and is very knowledgeable.  the tests in this class are tough but if you study you will be ok.
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY

comment: In order to pass this class, you must attend every class. There is typically a 45 minute to 1hr lab after every class. Every lab is the EXACT same you look at the same drawings and specs over and over the only difference is you look at different trades. The tests are combination of the lectures and book and require a lot of studying to pass.
The only requirement to passing the class is showing up. Gained very little from the class other than a free A.
She's decent but talks like she is on a construction site.
